Mod0_Description: {c_important}Frost Nova{/c} generates {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} Mana per enemy hit.
Mod4_Description: Killing enemies {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} by {c_important}Frost Nova{/c} reduces its Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} seconds per cast.
Mod1_Description: {c_important}Frost Nova{/c} makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} seconds, increased to {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} seconds against Bosses.
